hint: Use: Consume Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.
Passive: Shade SightGrants 400 bonus night vision.
moon_shard.notes: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
moon_shard.lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

hint: Upgrade: Town Portal ScrollUpgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

Active: HexTurns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.Instantly destroys illusions.Range: %abilitycastrange%
sheepstick.notes: The target will have a base movement speed of %sheep_movement_speed%, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
sheepstick.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

hint: Active: Soul Rend Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 130% damage.Range: %abilitycastrange%
bloodthorn.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
bloodthorn.lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

hint: Active: Hurricane Thrust Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 5 seconds, allows you to make 4 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.Allied Range: %abilitycastrange%Enemy Range: 400
Passive:  Dragon's Reach Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
hurricane_pike.notes:
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
hurricane_pike.lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

hint: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: %abilitycastrange%Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200
dagon_3.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

hint: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: %abilitycastrange%Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200
dagon_4.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

hint: Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.Damage: 400,500,600,700,800Range: %abilitycastrange%Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200
dagon_5.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

hint: Active: Demonic SummoningSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.Warrior:Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it.  Gains True Sight at level 3.Health: 700,800,900Damage: 75,100,125Mana Break Damage: 30,40,50Last Will Damage: 600,700,800Archer:Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.Health: 700,800,900Damage: 60,90,120Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9Aura Attack Speed: 5,7,9Aura Radius: 1200
necronomicon_3.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

hint: Passive: Ability UpgradeUpgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
ultimate_scepter.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

hint: Passive: Ability UpgradeUpgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
ultimate_scepter_2.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

hint: Active: Reset CooldownsResets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
refresher.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

hint: Passive: Assault Aura Grants 25 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by -5.Radius: 1200
assault.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

hint: Passive: Health RegenerationRestores 5% of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.
heart.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

hint: Active: Avatar Grants Spell Immunity.  Duration decreases with each use. Duration: 10,9,8,7,6,5 Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
black_king_bar.notes:
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
black_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

hint: Active: Arctic Blast Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4 seconds.Radius: 900
Passive: Freezing Aura Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by -45. Radius: 1200
shivas_guard.notes:
The wave extends at a speed of %blast_speed% to a max size of %blast_radius%.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
shivas_guard.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

hint: Active: Bloodpact Converts 30% of your max mana to health regeneration over 2 seconds.

Passive: Mana BatteryEach charge provides 0.2 MP regen and 0.35% Spell Amp. Nearby kills provide 1 charges. Dying causes you to lose 3 charges. Starts with 14 charges. Provides +100% Mana Regen Amplification.
bloodstone.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

hint: Passive: SpellblockBlocks most targeted spells once every 12 seconds.
Active: Transfer SpellblockTemporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 12 seconds.Range: %abilitycastrange%
sphere.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

hint: Active: Nullify Dispels the target and applies a debuff for 5 seconds. Continuously dispels the target. Anytime the target is attacked, it will be slowed by 80% for 0.5 seconds.Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

Passive: Everlasting Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
Passive: True Strike Your attacks cannot miss.
rapier.notes: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
rapier.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

hint: Passive: PierceGrants each attack a 75% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 100 bonus magical damage.
monkey_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

hint: Toggle: Burn When active, scorches enemies for 60 magical damage per second, and causes them to miss 17% of their attacks. Illusions deal 35 magical damage per second.Radius: 700
radiance.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

butterfly.notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
butterfly.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

hint: Passive: Critical StrikeGrants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.
greater_crit.notes: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
greater_crit.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

hint: Active: Chop Tree Destroy a target tree.Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%
Passive: Quell Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 18 for melee heroes, and 5 for ranged.
Passive: Cleave Deals 70% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target. Deals 50% against creeps. (Melee Only)
bfury.notes:
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
bfury.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

hint: Active: Mirror ImageCreates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage. Cooldown increased by 15 seconds on ranged heroes.Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
manta.notes:
Has a %invuln_duration% second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
manta.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

hint: Active: Shadow WalkMakes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units.  Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus physical damage to the target, and for 4 seconds, disable their passive abilities and heal and regeneration by 50%.
silver_edge.notes:
Backstab cannot miss.
Backstab does not pierce spell immunity.
silver_edge.lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

sange_and_yasha.notes: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
sange_and_yasha.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

hint: Active: Unholy RageIncreases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 5 seconds.
Passive: LifestealHeals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt.
satanic.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

hint: Active: Static ChargePlaces a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 200 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.Range: %abilitycastrange%

Passive: Chain LightningGrants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 170 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
mjollnir.notes:
Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than %static_seconary_radius% range away.
Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
mjollnir.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

hint: Passive: Cold Attack Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed for 3 seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by -45% movement speed and by -45 attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by -20% movement speed and by -20 attack speed.
skadi.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

hint: Active: Ether BlastConverts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.  Lasts for 4 seconds on allies and 4 seconds on enemies.  Enemy targets are also slowed by -80%, and take 1.5x your primary attribute + 125 as magical damage.Range: %abilitycastrange%
ethereal_blade.notes:
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.
Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
ethereal_blade.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

hint: Passive: Cooldown ReductionReduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.
Passive: Spell Lifesteal25% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.  Lifesteal reduced to 5% against creeps.
octarine_core.lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

hint: Active: MendRestores 300 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.Radius: 1200Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Passive: Guardian Aura Provides 2.5 health regeneration to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 16 health regeneration and 10 armor. Radius: 1200
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
guardian_greaves.notes: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
guardian_greaves.lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

hint: Active: Overwhelm Blinks to and stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.Range: %abilitycastrange%
Passive: Bash Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage.  Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.
Passive: Damage Block Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.
abyssal_blade.notes:
The stun is melee range.
Does not stack with other bashes.
Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
abyssal_blade.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

hint: Active: Fallen Sky Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after 0.5 seconds in a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 2 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every 1 seconds to enemy units and buildings for 6 seconds.Building Impact Damage: 75 Building Over Time Damage: 50 Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 Non-Building Over Time Damage: 90 Range: %abilitycastrange%
